snippet.title: God of War III - E3 2008 Chaos Trailer [HD]
snippet.description:
In the end... There will be ONLY CHAOS!!!
Best definition available of this trailer, downloaded directly from the servers of SCEA. Check it out!!!

God of War First released trailer in the 2008 E3 Convention in L.A. First sneak peek to the new and "final" delivery in the GOW saga.

Kratos, a young and bold captain in the Spartan army, facing death in the hands of the barbarians calls upon Ares: "Destroy my enemies and my life is yours..." A pledge that will consume him for the rest of his life.

Excellent Hack 'n' Slash game, great history and graphics. If you haven't played it it's highly recommended and trust me, you won't be dissapointed.
Only on Playstation. It just does everything.

Hope you enjoy it!
